SqlScript:
USE SUFS

SELECT I.IncomeTypeID, I.Amount
FROM dbo.Household H
JOIN dbo.Application A ON H.ApplicationID = A.ApplicationID
JOIN dbo.HouseholdMember HM ON HM.HouseholdID = H.HouseholdID
JOIN dbo.Income I ON HM.HouseholdMemberID = I.HouseholdMemberID
WHERE H.ApplicationID = $[FTC-OLA_ApplicationID]
AND I.Amount > 0
AND I.IncomeTypeID = 6
Name: FTC-OLA_ValidateApplicationIncome
